title: New leak gives us our first look at the upcoming OnePlus Nord 2T
content:
In January this year, renowned leaker OnLeaks shared details about an upcoming OnePlus mid-ranger called the OnePlus Nord 2T. The leak revealed that the device would succeed the OnePlus Nord 2 from last year and feature a few minor improvements. Shortly after that, we learned that the OnePlus Nord 2T could make its way to

The post New leak gives us our first look at the upcoming OnePlus Nord 2T appeared first on XDA.
description: Renowned leaker Digital Chat Station has shared what appear to be official renders of the upcoming OnePlus Nord 2T ahead of its launch.
